snippet: The United States attorney’s office in Manhattan issued remarks on Thursday in support of a lawsuit brought against the city by several disability rights groups.
lead_paragraph: The United States attorney’s office in Manhattan issued remarks on Thursday in support of a lawsuit brought against the city by several disability rights groups.

headline.main: Taxis Must Accommodate Wheelchairs, U.S. Attorney Says, Supporting Advocates’ Suit
headline.print_headline: Taxis Must Accommodate Wheelchairs, U.S. Attorney Says, Supporting Advocates’ Suit
headline.seo: U.S. Attorney Says Taxis Must Accommodate Wheelchairs
